faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I choose the right smart solution for my factory?
faq.a1: We recommend contacting our professional consultants to describe your factory status, challenges, and needs. We will provide a tailored solution based on your situation.
faq.q2: How long does system implementation take?
faq.a2: The implementation time depends on your factory size and system complexity. A single-line setup may take 2–4 weeks, while full-scale integration could take 2–3 months. We provide a detailed plan and timeline.
faq.q3: What after-sales service and technical support do you provide?
faq.a3: We offer complete after-sales services including system maintenance, upgrades, troubleshooting, and training. We also provide 24/7 emergency tech support to ensure system stability.
faq.q4: How can I evaluate the benefits after implementation?
faq.a4: We help you define KPIs such as improved productivity, reduced defect rates, and energy savings. Post-implementation, we offer regular reports to measure ROI.
